title-group.article-title: On Interactions of Production and Financial Decisions

abstract.p: This review surveys the literature analyzing the interactions of production decisions and capital structure, and finds that there are basically three ways in which the two types of decisions are linked. These give rise to three analytical approaches to the issue: a tax link, the agency approach, and the product-market (strategic) approach. The empirical evidence accumulated in this area of research is also examined.
